snippet: The cruise ship Costa Concordia will be lifted off the seabed by 30 huge tanks filled with air so it can be towed away from the Italian island where it capsized two years ago.
abstract: Wrecked cruise ship Costa Concordia will be lifted off the seabed by 30 huge tanks filled with air so it can be towed away from the Italian island of Giglio, where it capsized in 2012, killing 32 people.
lead_paragraph: The cruise ship Costa Concordia will be lifted off the seabed by 30 huge tanks filled with air so it can be towed away from the Italian island where it capsized two years ago.

headline.main: Italy: Wrecked Ship to Be Towed in June
headline.print_headline: Italy: Wrecked Ship to Be Towed in June
